data.eml:eml: Megaloptera, Raphidioptera, Neuroptera in Upper Silesian Museum entomological collection

Megaloptera, Raphidioptera, Neuroptera in Upper Silesian Museum entomological collection,English,The database contains faunistic information about a number of species from Neuropterida, based on material preserved in the Upper Silesian Museum, Bytom, Poland (USMB): (1) localites of Sialis morio and S. nigripes, (2) the faunistic review of 24 species and subspecies of Raphidioptera of Turkey, (3) reports of new localities of Osmylus multiguttatus and O. cilicicus from Turkey, (4) new faunistic data on four mantispids species: Mantispa aphavexellte, M. scabricollis, M. styriaca and Perlamantispa perla from Turkey, (5) data on ascalaphid species collected in Turkey.
